entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mauricie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 10:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

Humidity: 81 %

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:22 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:22 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:22 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
